articles.title: Video: Ben McDermott's blasts 'biggest hit in BBL history' out of Manuka Oval - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Ben McDermott has teased BBL fans across the country, falling just short of the first century of the season as he took the Hobart Hurricanes to a six wicket victory over the Sydney Thunder with 12 balls remaining.
